bibl.title: Greek Verse Inscriptions in Roman Egypt: Julia Balbilla's Sapphic Voice. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Introduction. - 1. The setting: The Memnon colossi at Egyptian Thebes. - 2. The author: Identifying Julia Balbilla. - 3. The voice: Ventriloquizing Sappho. - 4. The inscriptional evidence [I. Col. Memnon 28-31]. - 5. Archaizing, aeolicizing, mythologizing. - 6. A Sapphic voice. - 7. Reception of Sappho in the second century CE. - 8. Other ways of imitating Sappho: The case of Damo [I. Col. Memnon 83]. - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: Rosenmeyer Patricia, Greek Verse Inscriptions in Roman Egypt: Julia Balbilla's Sapphic Voice. Avec résumé en anglais.
